title: Average weekly working hours in Sweden 2019 , by type of employment
yAxis: Average number of working hours per week
summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week and Temporary employed has the lowest Average number of working hours per week.
The highest Form of Employment Self-employed has 9.9 more Average number of working hours per week than the lowest Form of Employment Temporary employed.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of working hours per week for 4 number of Form of Employments.
The Average number of working hours per week is highest at Form of Employment Self-employed and lowest at Form of Employment Temporary employed.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week and Temporary employed has the lowest Average number of working hours per week.
The highest Form of Employment Self-employed has 9.9 more Average number of working hours per week than the lowest Form of Employment Temporary employed.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week and Temporary employed has the lowest Average number of working hours per week.
The difference of Average number of working hours per week between the highest and lowest Form of Employment is 9.9.
Average number of working hours per week at Form of Employment Self-employed is 35.4 , second place is  at 35.4, and thirdly is Employed total at 30.2.
The lowest value 25.5 at Temporary employed is almost 1.17 times smaller than the average value 30.38.
Summing up the values of all Form of Employments, we get total 121.5.
